name: Deadly Force
description:
Deadly Force is a super fast paced shoot 'em up platformer with randomly generated guns and a level editor!

This game was made for the level editor challenge and therefore focuses on the community made levels. You can export levels then share them with friends for them to play. Send your best levels to me, and I will make packeges of the best community made levels for you guys!

Endless replayability with randomly generated guns and user made content! Keep on trying to get the best gun or try out the different styles with all sorts of guns! Compare your friends' stats with yours and see who is the most deadly!
